discussion.content:
agree, SLA
Before you begin
Ensure that the ITD feature is enabled.

If your device is running Cisco NX-OS Release 7.0(3)I3(1) or later, ensure that the following commands are configured: feature sla sender and feature sla responder

questions.question_text: On which two features does ITD depend? (Choose two.)

discussion.content:
Reference:
https://community.cisco.com/t5/application-centric/service-graph-logs/td-p/2936131

Looking for the reference above I think C is not the correct answer.
Otherwise APIC 1 would be some sort of single point of failure.

Assuming that the Device Package MOs belong to a specific tenant, the Logs are
on that APIC which is the shard leader for this tenant. So I think D is probably the best answer.

questions.question_text: On a cluster with three APICs, on which APIC can you see actual device package logs?

choices.D: depending on the tenant, on the APIC that is a leader for the shard for that particular tenant
choices.B: on the one that is a leader for device package service
choices.A: depending on the device package, on the APIC that is a leader for that device package

questions.question_text: On which two criteria can an endpoint be classified statically into an application EPG? (Choose two.)

discussion.content: Endpoints assigned to an EPG can be defined in several ways. Endpoints can be defined by virtual port, physical port, IP address, DNS name, and in the future through identification methods such as IP address plus Layer 4 port and others.
e: When an EPG uses a static binding path, the encapsulation VLAN associated with this EPG must be part of a static VLAN pool.

choices.C: It occurs when a client connects to a switch and launches a distributed denial of service attack against the VTP domain. This attack is possible only ifthe client knows the VTP password.
choices.D: It occurs when a server with a higher revision number and a wrong VTP database is inserted into the VTP domain. This situation may occur when a new switch plugged into a stable VTP domain. The incorrect database is propagated to the domain and the earlier stable database is overwritten. D
choices.B: It occurs when switches with different VTP versions are connected together. This situation may occur when a new switch is plugged into a stable VTP domain. The MAC address table of the new switch overrides the MAC address table of stable switches causing interruption of service.
choices.A: It occurs because of configuration mismatch on VTPv3 switches. This problem can be avoided using a confirmation management tool.

questions.question_text: Which statement about VTP bombing is true?

discussion.content: atomic counters does not make sense but traceroute does.

comments.content: i could see from the real gear that the correct answer should be traceroute.
